CustomField.description: BODEV-81: Hours past after creation until now (open cases) or closure (closed cases)
CustomField.formula:
/* If Open, return hours past since creation If Closed, return hours past until closure */
(IF(IsClosed, ClosedDate, NOW()) - CreatedDate) * 24
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Open cases: hours past since creation until now. Closed cases: hours past since creation until closure.
CustomField.label: Hours after Creation
